|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Has Boot ROM socket |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 1998 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = USA, Singapore
|powledcolor = none |connactled = Yes |spdledcolor = Yes |leddupcolor = No |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This particular card has a P/N of ''03-0172-110 C''. The unit's S/N is ''6QP128CEED''.
The '''3Com''' logo, all the model / product info, "10/100BASE-TX Ethernet Adapter", and "(C)1998 3Com Corporation" is silkscreened on the top of the card. :The '''3Com''' Ethernet controller is marked with... :*'''Parallel Tasking II''' :*'''Performance''' :*'''3Com 40-0483-004''' :*'''9832S 15484437''' ::*A card w/ a S/N of ''6QPD73C5CB'' (manuf. in Singapore) has text of '''9912S 21055437''' here :*'''LUCENT 40-04834''' :"10/100 Mbps Signalling Rate", "FAB 02-0172-002 REV A", and <small>"COVERED BY ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING PATENTS: 5268899, 5307459, 5434872, 5485584, 5530874, 5568469" is etched onto the back of the bottom layer of the board.</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5268899 Patent '''US 5268899 A''': Apparatus for generating pseudo-random numbers in a communication system, or other system involving a shared resource]</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5307459 Patent '''US 5307459 A''': Network adapter with host indication optimization]</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5434872 Patent '''US 5434872 A''': Apparatus for automatic initiation of data transmission]</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5485584 Patent '''US 5485584 A''': Apparatus for simulating a stack structure using a single register and a counter to provide transmit status in a programmed I/O ethernet adapter with early interrupts]</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5530874 Patent '''US 5530874 A''': Network adapter with an indication signal mask and an interrupt signal mask]</small> :*<small>[https://www.google.com/patents/US5568469 Patent '''US 5568469 A''': Method and apparatus for controlling latency and jitter in a local area network which uses a CSMA/CD protocol]</small>
[[Category:English Documentation]]
